text: aur hamane us jaati (banee israeel) ko, jo nirbal samajhe ja rahe the, dharatee (shaam desh) ke pashchimon tatha poorvon ka, jisamen hamane barakat dee thee, adhikaaree bana diya aur (is prakaar he nabee!) aapake paalanahaar ka shubh vachan banee israeel ke lie poora ho gaya, unake dhairy rakhane ke kaaran tatha hamane use dhavast kar diya, jo firaun aur usakee jaati kalaakaaree kar rahee thee aur jo belen chhapparon par chadha rahe the
